【抗暴之戰●茂名】火葬場疑遷播陽鎮引爆萬人示威 武警射TG逾40傷傳青年被打死
47分鐘前
即時兩岸
[url=https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fs.nextmedia.com%2Frealtime%2Fa.php%3Fi%3D20191217%26s%3D10793096%26a%3D60387209%26utm_source%3Dfacebook%26utm_medium%3Dsocial%26utm_campaign%3Dhkad_article_share%26utm_content%3Dshare_link][/url][url=https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=%E3%80%90%E6%8A%97%E6%9A%B4%E4%B9%8B%E6%88%B0%E2%97%8F%E8%8C%82%E5%90%8D%E3%80%91%E7%81%AB%E8%91%AC%E5%A0%B4%E7%96%91%E9%81%B7%E6%92%AD%E9%99%BD%E9%8E%AE%E5%BC%95%E7%88%86%E8%90%AC%E4%BA%BA%E7%A4%BA%E5%A8%81%20%20%E6%AD%A6%E8%AD%A6%E5%B0%84TG%E9%80%BE40%E5%82%B7%E5%82%B3%E9%9D%92%E5%B9%B4%E8%A2%AB%E6%89%93%E6%AD%BB&url=https%3A%2F%2Fs.nextmedia.com%2Frealtime%2Fa.php%3Fi%3D20191217%26s%3D10793096%26a%3D60387209%26utm_source%3Dtwitter%26utm_medium%3Dsocial%26utm_campaign%3Dhkad_article_share%26utm_content%3Dshare_link&via=%E8%98%8B%E6%9E%9C%E6%97%A5%E5%A0%B1][/url][url=whatsapp://send?text=%E3%80%90%E6%8A%97%E6%9A%B4%E4%B9%8B%E6%88%B0%E2%97%8F%E8%8C%82%E5%90%8D%E3%80%91%E7%81%AB%E8%91%AC%E5%A0%B4%E7%96%91%E9%81%B7%E6%92%AD%E9%99%BD%E9%8E%AE%E5%BC%95%E7%88%86%E8%90%AC%E4%BA%BA%E7%A4%BA%E5%A8%81  %E6%AD%A6%E8%AD%A6%E5%B0%84TG%E9%80%BE40%E5%82%B7%E5%82%B3%E9%9D%92%E5%B9%B4%E8%A2%AB%E6%89%93%E6%AD%BB - https%3A%2F%2Fs.nextmedia.com%2Frealtime%2Fa.php%3Fi%3D20191217%26s%3D10793096%26a%3D60387209%26utm_source%3Dwhatsapp%26utm_medium%3Dmessenger%26utm_campaign%3Dhkad_article_share%26utm_content%3Dshare_link][/url]

香港抗爭精神輸出廣東茂名，文樓鎮市民上月底不滿政府以興建人文生態園為名徵地，實際建設火葬場，展開港式大規模示威，最終鎮黨委書記李偉華「跪低」宣佈永不在文樓鎮興建火葬場後，抗爭在短短4天落幕。昨日，在距離文樓鎮只有27公里的播揚鎮，傳出當地政府計劃將火葬場遷往當地，昨日開始引發當地逾萬人示威，200多名武警到場動用催淚彈鎮壓，今日傳出有年輕人被活活打死。播陽醫院今日向《蘋果》證實，至今約有40多名傷者送院救治。


廣告
